record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, there will now be a period for the transaction of morning business for 60 minutes, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each. Under the previous order, the first 30 minutes will be controlled by the majority leader or his designee.
record.narrative: (The remarks of Mr. ALLARD pertaining to the introduction of S. 699 are located in today's Record under "Statements on Introduced Bills and Joint Resolutions.")

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum and ask unanimous consent that time under the quorum call be charged equally to both sides.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
